title: Auto Answer certain phone calls?
content:
Hi folks,

I am wondering - is there a way to set up a script or automated action, where if a particular phone # calls me, it automatically answers and keys '9'?

To give background:

The entrance buzzer to my apartment is connected to my cell phone (Pixel 2).  

I recently sublet my place while taking care of an ill parent. My building wont change the cell number connected to my buzzer (i.e. change it to my subletter's) - so each time they come in / out - they need to call me through the buzzer and i hit 9 to let them in,

As you can imagine, its not sustainable.

At this point id be fine if every call that comes in would be automatically answered w a key 9 lol.
